attributes.attribute:
var stage = 'clsa-dcs-f1.FunctionalStatus:' var sections = { 'Fun':[ 'FUL_FORCDG_COF1', 'FUL_FORC_COF1', 'FUL_FSTRDG_COF1', 'FUL_FSTR_COF1', 'FUL_HDLGDG_COF1', 'FUL_HDLG_COF1', 'FUL_KNCUTDG_COF1', 'FUL_KNCUT_COF1', 'FUL_LFT10_COF1', 'FUL_LFT1ODG_COF1', 'FUL_MKBEDDG_COF1', 'FUL_MKBED_COF1', 'FUL_PUSHDG_COF1', 'FUL_PUSH_COF1', 'FUL_SHLDDG_COF1', 'FUL_SHLD_COF1', 'FUL_SIT1HDG_COF1', 'FUL_SIT1H_COF1', 'FUL_ST15DG_COF1', 'FUL_ST15_COF1', 'FUL_STDUPDG_COF1', 'FUL_STDUP_COF1', 'FUL_STOOPDG_COF1', 'FUL_STOOP_COF1', 'FUL_WK23BDG_COF1', 'FUL_WK23B_COF1', 'FUL_WSHBKDG_COF1', 'FUL_WSHBK_COF1'] }
var str = [] for(var key in sections) { var rcount = 0 var qcount = 0 var arr = sections[key] for(var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) { var j = $(stage + arr[i]) if(j.isNull().value()) { continue } qcount++ rcount += j.any('REFUSED').value() ? 1 : 0 } if(0 == qcount) { str.push(null) } else { str.push(100.0*rcount/qcount) } } newSequence(str, 'decimal')
